items.preText: Om Pashupati: "SL have never really gotten the grip ever since their BIG 3 ( Dilshan, Sangakkara and Jayawardene) have retired. It is all about grooming talent. They should prepare A and B teams and make them play with corresponding teams across the world -just like India, Australia or South Africa have been doing. One has to also admit the grooming the likes of IPL, BBL, BPL & CPL provide to the local talent."
items.text: full on leg stump, and blocked off the front foot. Mustafizur coming around the wicket now
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Aponso, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, and driven to cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Aponso, no run

items.text: yorker just outside off stump, and he digs this away to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Aponso, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and the batsman goes onto the back foot. Nudges this with the open face of the bat to short third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Aponso, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he under-cuts a shot through to the keeper. Goes to him on the bounce, who jumps to his right to smartly intercept
items.postText: Anam Mirpur: "8 down, but still nothing for Shakib. A rare match for him with a golden duck!"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Aponso, no run

items.text: flat on off, and angling into his body. Tries to pull but misses, and the ball hits his front leg. Big appeal for lbw, but not given! Looked very close
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: good length on off, and blocked towards the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: full on middle, and he' sweeps this square to the sweeper on the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: edged! But the keeper can't get his hands to this. Length ball on off, that the batsman fends off the back foot, but the ball turns away slightly, and therefore takes the outside edge. It runs away fine to third man
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, 2 runs

items.text: good length outside off, and spinning into the batsman
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump, and that's been defended off the front foot once again
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: smashed right over the bowler's head! Overpitched on off, and Dilruwan shimmies down the wicket, before drilling a six right over the bowler's head
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, SIX runs

items.text: good length just outside off, and blocked off the front foot to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: full on off, but spins into Dilruwan's pads. Bat-pads a defensive shot towards the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: full outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and blocked off the front foot with soft hands
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Aponso, no run

items.text: length ball on middle, and that's been clipped off his pads to the fielder at midwicket. Drinks break as well
items.postText: Jamil Uddin: "Who is keeping for BD Mushi or Liton?" -- Liton
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Aponso, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he goes onto the back foot to defend
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: overpitched on middle stump, and swept away past the square-leg umpire for a single
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to MDK Perera, 1 run

items.text: spins into his body, and he can't flick it square. Hits the flap of his front pad
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: full on off, and sharply turning into the batsman's pads. Flicked to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: tossed up outside off, and the straight-drive is brilliantly stopped by the bowler on his follow through
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: good length on off, he clips this to the leg side off the front foot
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Aponso, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run

items.text: full on middle again, and this time it's been tapped back to Shakib
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to MDK Perera, no run
